title: Chequiaraju
text: Chequiaraju, Chequiarajo"," or Checquiacraju (possibly from <a href="Quechua%20language">Quechua</a>, "chiqlla" green, "rahu" snow, ice, mountain with snow) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in the <a href="Cordillera%20Blanca">Cordillera Blanca</a> in the <a href="Andes">Andes</a> of <a href="Peru">Peru</a>, about high. It is situated in the <a href="Ancash%20Region">Ancash Region</a>, <a href="Carhuaz%20Province">Carhuaz Province</a>, <a href="Shilla%20District">Shilla District</a>. Chequiaraju lies northwest of <a href="Hualc%C3%A1n">Hualcán</a> and the lake <a href="Chiqllaqucha%20%28Ancash%29">Chiqllaqucha</a>.
